name: 岳精辉
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院一年级（2025-至今）硕士研究生，师从张鼎文教授。研究兴趣包括场景图生成，3D视觉。
bio_en: I am currently a freshman ( 2025 - present ) graduate student in Automation College of Northwestern Polytechnical University, and studied under Professor Zhang Dingwen.  Research interests include scene map generation, 3D Vision.
